commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew: /** * Create a field by specifying its name, value and how it will * be saved in the index. Term vectors will not be stored in the index. * * @param name The name of the field * @param value The string to process * @param store Whether value should be stored in the index * @param index Whether the field should be indexed, and if so, if it should * be tokenized before indexing * @throws NullPointerException if name or value is null * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the field is neither stored nor indexed */ public Field(String name, String value, Store store, Index index) { this(name, value, store, index, TermVector.NO); }
commits.sourceOld: /** * Create a field by specifying its name, value and how it will * be saved in the index. Term vectors will not be stored in the index. * * @param name The name of the field * @param value The string to process * @param store Whether value should be stored in the index * @param index Whether the field should be indexed, and if so, if it should * be tokenized before indexing * @throws NullPointerException if name or value is null * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the field is neither stored nor indexed */ public Field(String name, String value, Store store, Index index) { this(name, value, store, index, TermVector.NO); }
